content:
# We have successfully crafted one stone furnace, but we still need more stone to complete the crafting process.
# Currently, we have 5 units of stone, and we need at least 10 units to smelt the iron ore into plates.

# Let's gather more stone to ensure we have enough for our smelting process.
move_to(stone_position)  # Move back to the stone location
harvest_resource(stone_position, quantity=5)  # Harvest additional stone
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check inventory after harvesting more stone

# After gathering the stone, we can proceed to smelt the iron ore into iron plates.
